body_html:
I would double check your cuda and cudnn install, I think you have older versions, despite what you think. Those symbols are available in cudnn v4 and above, so this suggests you have an earlier version.

Maybe remove the existing cuda and cudnn versions and install them from scratch.

I would also recommend using:

  • cudnn v4, unless you have GTX1080, in which case use cudnn v5
  • cuda toolkit 7.5, unless you have GTX1080, in which case use cuda 8.0 RC

cudnn v4, unless you have GTX1080, in which case use cudnn v5
cuda toolkit 7.5, unless you have GTX1080, in which case use cuda 8.0 RC
body:
I would double check your cuda and cudnn install, I think you have older versions, despite what you think.   Those symbols are available in cudnn v4 and above, so this suggests you have an earlier version.

Maybe remove the existing cuda and cudnn versions and install them from scratch.

I would also recommend using:
- cudnn v4, unless you have GTX1080, in which case use cudnn v5
- cuda toolkit 7.5, unless you have GTX1080, in which case use cuda 8.0 RC
